@Daygon title says xvid but the description  says mp4 so all i can say is learn to read because people make mistakes sometimes (we are human beings and fallible) and its always a good idea to cya and double check any information you ever see. Taking things as face value and proceeding accordingly can get you hurt or worse.
thanks
cheers!

@vatel88 
Actually I did read the description and it reads "Codec ID = Xvid" which is what you need to look at. Others torrents of this particular downloader have stated that the codec is FMP4 and that is fine. The FORMAT is MPEG-4 which IS NOT an Mp4 file. The Avi container can use MPEG-4 format and usually does. In this case the uploader has not used the Xvid codec but instead has used the FMP4 codec. This seems to be regular for this uploader when everyone else uses Xvid, which is why I placed the comment as alot of people play on DVD player and not PC hence this won't play on most older DVD players.
Sorry Uploader not Downloader. Because people make mistakes!
Would not play on the 360 video player. Great movie and quality overall though.
